typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id_odsp as string,
		id_event as string,
		sort_order as short,
		time as short,
		text as string,
		event_type as integer,
		event_type2 as integer,
		side as short,
		event_team as string,
		opponent as string,
		player as string,
		player2 as string,
		player_in as string,
		player_out as string,
		shot_place as string,
		shot_outcome as string,
		is_goal as boolean,
		location as string,
		bodypart as string,
		assist_method as short,
		situation as string,
		fast_break as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> specifySchemaExtracts
source(output(
		Type as string,
		Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> locationMap
specifySchemaExtracts derive(eventTypeMap = case(
    event_type == 0,'Announcement',
    event_type == 1,'Attempt',
    event_type == 2,'Corner',
    event_type == 3,'Foul',
    event_type == 4,'Yellow Card',
    event_type == 5,'Second yellow card',
    event_type == 6,'Red card',
    event_type == 7,'Substitution',
    event_type == 8,'Free kick won',
    event_type == 9,'Offside',
    event_type == 10,'Hand ball',
    event_type == 11,'Penalty conceded',
    event_type == 98, 'NA'
),
		dummy = 1) ~> dictionaryMapping
dictionaryMapping, locationMap join(location == Type,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinStringDataViaLookup
joinStringDataViaLookup select(mapColumn(
		id_odsp,
		id_event,
		sort_order,
		text,
		event_type,
		event_type2,
		side,
		event_team,
		opponent,
		player,
		player2,
		player_in,
		player_out,
		shot_place,
		shot_outcome,
		is_goal,
		location,
		bodypart,
		assist_method,
		situation,
		fast_break,
		eventTypeMap,
		Type,
		Name,
		dummy,
		time
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 200,
		id_event
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> columnSelectorRenaming
columnSelectorRenaming window(over(time),
	desc(sort_order, true),
	TimeBins = nTile(10)) ~> timeBins
timeBins sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	batchSize: 2000,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 40)) ~> SQLDBSink
